original_text: “When men fight with one another and the wife of the one draws near to rescue her husband from the hand of him who is beating him and puts out her hand and seizes him by the private parts,
korean_text: 두 사람이 서로 싸울 때에 한 사람의 아내가 그 치는 자의 손에서 그의 남편을 구하려 하여 가까이 가서 손을 벌려 그 사람의 음낭을 잡거든

sentences.original_text: When men fight with one another
and the wife of the one draws near
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 한 사람의 아내가 다가와서

sentences.original_text: from the hand of him who is beating him
and seizes him by the private parts,
